set.name: Duel Decks: Phyrexia vs. the Coalition

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain — Target player draws a card for each basic land type among lands he or she controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each commander looked at the others and wondered who would be first to break the alliance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample. Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Echo 2$ (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Bone Shredder enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Carrion Feeder can't block. Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Carrion Feeder.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stinking of rot, it leaps between gravestones in search of its next meal.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They stop for nothing, not even the end of a battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. `: Put a charge counter on Coalition Relic. At the beginning of your precombat main phase, remove all charge counters from Coalition Relic. Add one mana of any color to your mana pool for each charge counter removed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Darigaaz, the Igniter deals combat damage to a player, you may pay 2%. If you do, choose a color, then that player reveals his or her hand and Darigaaz deals damage to the player equal to the number of cards of that color revealed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one — • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Darigaaz's Charm deals 3 damage to target creature or player. • Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Elfhame Palace enters the battlefield tapped. `: Add ^ or @ to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Llanowar has seven elfhames, or kingdoms, each with its own ruler. Their palaces are objects of awe, wonder, and envy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain — Counter target spell unless its controller pays 1 for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Effective use of terrain is a lesson good commanders learn quickly.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Domain — Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fouler than a necromancer's kiss.—Jamuraan expression

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds one mana of any color to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Phyrexians descended, Multani paused to reflect on the beauty that might never be seen again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in target opponent's hand. 3@: Tap target creature. Activate this ability only if Gerrard Capashen is attacking.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap target creature. It gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Unless you like the idea of becoming some goblin's lunch, get up and move!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast Harrow, sacrifice a land. Search your library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No spot in nature is truly barren.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death is a generous author, always willing to grant a stirring final chapter.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 3, `: Put a 1/1 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying and haste named Hornet onto the battlefield. Destroy it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Equip 0

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After lightning struck the cliffs, the ore became iron, the iron became steel, and the steel became greaves. The lightning never left.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand. You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He could find no strength left to budge, no power left to fight, no will left to live. Luckily, they could find him.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1^: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've journeyed across Dominaria. Phyrexians are everywhere. Plague is everywhere. There's no place left to hide."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.) Whenever Order of Yawgmoth deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An audience of one with the malice of thousands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying $: Phyrexian Battleflies gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than twice each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After encountering them, Squee finally lost his appetite for bugs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Phyrexian Broodlings.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With limited resources and near unlimited time, Kerrick used parts from one beast to build another.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Phyrexian Colossus doesn't untap during your untap step. Pay 8 life: Untap Phyrexian Colossus. Phyrexian Colossus can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Flying
`, Sacrifice Phyrexian Debaser: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The second stage of the illness: high fever and severe infectiousness."—Phyrexian progress notes

property.name: Rules
property.value: `, Sacrifice Phyrexian Defiler: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The third stage of the illness: muscle aches and persistent cough."—Phyrexian progress notes

property.name: Rules
property.value: `, Sacrifice Phyrexian Denouncer: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The first stage of the illness: rash and nausea."—Phyrexian progress notes

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Phyrexian Gargantua enters the battlefield, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Other Phyrexians have nightmares about the gargantua.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Phyrexia wastes nothing. Its food chain is a spiraling cycle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An invasion weapon of ages past, the glistening oil contained the blueprints of countless atrocities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Phyrexian Negator is dealt damage, sacrifice that many permanents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `, Sacrifice Phyrexian Plaguelord: Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn. Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The final stage of the illness: delirium, convulsions, and death."—Phyrexian progress notes

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Phyrexian Processor enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life. 4, `: Put an X/X black Minion creature token onto the battlefield, where X is the life paid as Phyrexian Processor entered the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Add $ to your mana pool. 2$: Phyrexian Totem becomes a 5/5 black Horror artifact creature with trample until end of turn. Whenever Phyrexian Totem is dealt damage, if it's a creature, sacrifice that many permanents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2, `, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The secrets of Phyrexia are expensive. You will pay in brass and bone, steel and sinew."—Kaervek

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain — 3, `: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Priest of Gix enters the battlefield, add $$$ to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Gix doesn't want a people to rule but puppets to entertain his madness."—Xantcha, Phyrexian outcast

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2, `: You may tap or untap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have no illusions," Volrath warned Greven, "about free will."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Quirion Elves enters the battlefield, choose a color. `: Add ^ to your mana pool. `: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Rith, the Awakener deals combat damage to a player, you may pay 2^. If you do, choose a color, then put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token onto the battlefield for each permanent of that color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one — • Destroy target nonbasic land. • Put three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens onto the battlefield. • Prevent all damage a source of your choice would deal this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Father of Machines! Your filigree gaze carves us, and the scars dance upon our grateful flesh."—Phyrexian Scriptures

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shivan Oasis enters the battlefield tapped. `: Add % or ^ to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the hardiest explorers survive to eat the fruit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target green creature. It can't be regenerated. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elves had the edge in guile, skill, and valor. But in the end, only sheer numbers mattered.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker 1^ and/or 2# (You may pay an additional 1^ and/or 2# as you cast this spell.) When Sunscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its 1^ kicker, destroy target creature with flying. When Sunscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its 2# kicker, draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tendrils of Corruption deals X damage to target creature and you gain X life, where X is the number of Swamps you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Darkness doesn't always send its minions to do its dirty work.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Take two steps north into the unsettled future, south into the unquiet past, east into the present day, or west into the great unknown.

property.name: Rules
property.value: %, `: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn. @, `: Tap target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker % and/or @ (You may pay an additional % and/or @ as you cast this spell.) When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its % kicker, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player. When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its @ kicker, destroy target artifact.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker 1$ and/or ^ (You may pay an additional 1$ and/or ^ as you cast this spell.) When Thunderscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its 1$ kicker, target player discards two cards. When Thunderscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its ^ kicker, destroy target enchantment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Treva, the Renewer deals combat damage to a player, you may pay 2@. If you do, choose a color, then you gain 1 life for each permanent of that color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one — • Destroy target enchantment. • Exile target attacking creature. • Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Domain — Tribal Flames deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fire is the universal language."—Jhoira, master artificer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker 8% (You may pay an additional 8% as you cast this spell.) Urza's Rage can't be countered by spells or abilities. Urza's Rage deals 3 damage to target creature or player. If Urza's Rage was kicked, instead it deals 10 damage to that creature or player and the damage can't be prevented.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kicker 1% (You may pay an additional 1% as you cast this spell.) When Verduran Emissary enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The missing piece to every puzzle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature can't be blocked and has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Equip 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: Worn Powerstone enters the battlefield tapped. `: Add 2 to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even a fragment of a powerstone contains within it not just energy, but space—vast dimensions trapped in fragile crystal.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Yavimaya Elder dies, you may search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library. 2, Sacrifice Yavimaya Elder: Draw a card.
